# Commure / Augmedix Healthcare AI Solutions Research

**Research Date:** November 21, 2025
**Status:** Active - Major Enterprise Healthcare AI Platform

---

## Executive Summary

Commure is a leading healthcare AI platform company that has rapidly consolidated the ambient AI documentation market through strategic acquisitions, including Augmedix ($139M, October 2024) and Memora Health (December 2024). Valued at $6 billion following its 2023 merger with Athelas, Commure has secured the largest AI deployments in healthcare with HCA Healthcare (188 hospitals, 2,400 ambulatory sites) and Tenet Healthcare (2,200+ physicians).

---

## 1. Company Profile

### Corporate Overview

| Attribute | Details |
|-----------|---------|
| **Company Name** | Commure (formerly Commure + Athelas) |
| **Headquarters** | Mountain View, California |
| **Valuation** | $6 billion (2023) |
| **Key Investors** | General Catalyst, HCA Healthcare, Sequoia Capital |
| **CEO** | Tanay Tandon (Co-founder of Athelas) |
| **COO** | Deepika Bodapati (Co-founder of Athelas) |
| **CTO** | Dhruv Parthasarathy |
| **Chairman** | Hemant Taneja (CEO, General Catalyst; Co-founder, Commure) |

### Acquisition History

| Date | Target | Value | Strategic Rationale |
|------|--------|-------|---------------------|
| October 2023 | Athelas | N/A (merger) | $70M investment at $6B valuation; combined clinical AI capabilities |
| October 2024 | Augmedix | $139M | Ambient AI pioneer; 20+ health systems; 3M+ appointments |
| December 2024 | Memora Health | Undisclosed | Digital care navigation; patient engagement automation |

### Recent Funding

- **June 2025:** $200M growth financing from General Catalyst's Customer Value Fund (CVF)
- **Purpose:** Accelerate AI-powered RCM platform and meet surging demand

### Recognition & Awards (2025)

- **Fortune Future 50 List** - One of only two health tech companies recognized
- **TIME World's Top HealthTech Companies** - Outstanding Performance in AI & Data Analytics
- **TIME Health Information & Management** - Ambient AI platform recognition

---

## 2. Current Product Offerings

### Commure Platform Suite

#### Commure Ambient (AI Clinical Documentation)
- Real-time ambient listening and note generation
- Multi-specialty support (25+ specialties)
- Autonomous coding at point of care
- Charge capture and CDI integration
- 80% reduction in documentation time
- 2 hours saved per physician per day

#### Commure Agents (June 2025 Launch)
AI-powered colleagues that automate complex healthcare tasks:

| Agent Type | Function |
|------------|----------|
| **AI Call Center Agent** | Handles incoming patient calls |
| **Scheduling Agent (Sherpa)** | Automates appointment scheduling |
| **Patient Outreach Agent** | Manages proactive patient communication |
| **Referral Management Agent** | Processes referrals |
| **Prior Authorization Agent** | Automates authorization workflows |
| **Discharge Planning Agent** | Streamlines discharge coordination |

#### Revenue Cycle Management
- End-to-end automation for coding, prior authorization, eligibility
- Claims submission, posting, and appeals
- Always-current payer rules engine
- Denials management automation

#### Practice Management OS
- Cloud-based operating system
- AI agents for unified patient scheduling
- Patient engagement and task orchestration
- Cross-EHR workflow management

### Augmedix Product Suite

#### Augmedix Go (Pure AI)
- Cost-effective, scalable AI documentation
- Instant draft medical notes from conversations
- Supports 50+ medical specialties
- Problem-based note approach (HPI + A&P structure)
- Mobile app with ambient AI technology
- Real-time draft generation

#### Augmedix Assist (Hybrid)
- AI-drafted notes with human specialist editing
- Coding support
- Orders and referral letters
- AVS (After Visit Summary) generation
- Data entry assistance
- Notes ready for sign-off within 1 hour

#### Augmedix Live (Full Service)
- Synchronous medical documentation
- Real-time human scribe support
- Point-of-care support and notifications
- Premium quality assurance

### Clinical Decision Support Features
- Point-of-care notifications in real-time
- Lab order reminders
- Medication prescription prompts
- Available test result alerts
- Authorization and referral alerts
- Missing patient information warnings

---

## 3. Technology Stack

### Architecture Overview

| Component | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| **Core Platform** | CommureOS - proprietary integration engine |
| **AI Foundation** | LLM-powered with advanced NLP |
| **Deployment** | Cloud-based, enterprise-grade |
| **Integration** | 60+ EHR systems supported |

### Multi-Model / LLM Capabilities
- Advanced natural language processing (NLP)
- Real-time transcription and summarization
- Clinical context extraction
- Autonomous documentation generation
- Problem-based note structuring

### Agentic AI Architecture
Commure's Healthcare Agentic AI is designed to:
- Autonomously perform complex tasks
- Operate with greater autonomy and contextual understanding
- Be embedded into clinical and operational workflows
- Take meaningful actions, not just provide information
- Coordinate with humans and other agents

**Key Quote from CEO Tanay Tandon:** "Agents are clearly the next evolution of how people are using language models."

### Knowledge Graph / Data Infrastructure
- Common data infrastructure across health systems
- Seamless ingestion of unstructured data (EHRs, PDFs, handwritten notes)
- Structured data extraction from conversations
- Cross-EHR data harmonization

### Hybrid Human + AI Model (Augmedix)

**Notebuilder Platform:**
- Facilitates AI-human quality assurance process
- Medical Documentation Specialists (MDS) review and enhance AI drafts
- Tech-enabled specialists function as care team members
- Ensures premium quality without loss of fidelity

**Quality Assurance Process:**
1. AI generates initial draft from conversation
2. Human specialists review for accuracy
3. Guideline compliance verification
4. Context and medical content validation
5. Final note delivery within 1 hour (Assist tier)

### Security & Compliance
- HITRUST Certification
- HIPAA Compliance
- Enterprise-grade security
- SOC 2 compliance

---

## 4. EHR Integrations

### Integration Scope
- **60+ EHR systems** supported
- **30+ EMR systems** for ambient AI
- Bi-directional data exchange
- Real-time note upload to discrete chart sections

### Key EHR Partnerships

#### Epic Integration
- **Epic Toolbox Designation** for Ambient Voice Recognition
- Deep workflow integration
- Supported in North East Medical Services (NEMS) deployment

#### MEDITECH Expanse Integration (2025)
- **MEDITECH Alliance Member** (March 2025)
- Direct embedding in **MEDITECH Expanse Now** mobile app (September 2025)
- Gold-standard secure data exchange
- 90 minutes saved per provider per day

#### Oracle Health (Cerner)
- Full integration support
- Enterprise deployment capability

#### Other Supported EHRs
- 50+ additional EHR systems via Augmedix
- athenahealth, NextGen, eClinicalWorks, and others

---

## 5. Health System Customers

### Major Enterprise Deployments

#### HCA Healthcare (Exclusive Partner)
| Metric | Detail |
|--------|--------|
| **Announcement** | October 23, 2024 |
| **Scope** | 188 hospitals, 2,400 ambulatory sites |
| **Annual Appointments** | ~10 million |
| **Status** | Co-developed ambient AI platform |
| **Use Cases** | ED, hospitalist operations, ambulatory care |

**Executive Quote - Dr. Michael Schlosser, SVP Care Transformation, HCA Healthcare:**
"Our collaboration with Commure and Augmedix is bringing time-saving and innovative solutions directly to the hands of our healthcare providers."

#### Tenet Healthcare
| Metric | Detail |
|--------|--------|
| **Announcement** | November 19, 2024 |
| **Scope** | Tenet Physician Resources (2,200+ physicians) |
| **Product** | Commure Scribe ambient AI |
| **Status** | Enterprise-wide deployment |

#### Other Notable Customers
- **DRH Health** (November 2025) - 128-bed regional health system, MEDITECH integration
- **Hughston Clinic** (November 2025) - One of nation's largest private orthopedic groups
- **Bethany Children's Health Center** (September 2025) - Inpatient and outpatient deployment
- **North East Medical Services (NEMS)** - Epic integration deployment
- **20+ major health systems** via Augmedix legacy relationships
- **Hundreds of sites of care** across the network

### GPO Contract
- **Vizient Contract** (January 2025) - Nation's largest provider-driven healthcare performance improvement company

### Scale Metrics
- 250K+ providers powered
- 20+ million patient visits annually
- Tens of billions of dollars in annual claims processed
- 60+ of the largest IDNs in the country

## 6. KLAS Research

### KLAS Coverage

| Report | Details |
|--------|---------|
| **Vendor Page** | [klasresearch.com/vendor-ratings/augmedix/65147](https://klasresearch.com/vendor-ratings/augmedix/65147) |
| **Report Type** | Emerging Technology Spotlight (2020) |
| **Category** | Physician Documentation Service |

### KLAS 2025 Category Updates
KLAS added new categories relevant to Commure/Augmedix:
- **Ambient Speech** - Direct category for ambient AI documentation
- **Autonomous Coding** - Aligns with Commure's coding automation
- **Clinician Digital Workflow** - Matches workflow integration focus
- **Conversational AI** - Covers AI agent capabilities

**Note:** Detailed KLAS ratings require subscription access. Public data shows Augmedix was featured in KLAS Emerging Technology Spotlight focusing on physician documentation services with interviews from early adopters.

### Alternative Review Data (G2)
- Augmedix empowers clinicians by eliminating administrative burden
- Transforms natural conversations into organized medical notes
- Structured data and point-of-care notifications

## 7. Clinical Capabilities Matrix

| Capability | Availability | Details |
|------------|-------------|---------|
| **Ambient Documentation** | Yes | Core competency; 25+ specialties |
| **Autonomous Coding** | Yes | Real-time at point of care |
| **CDI (Clinical Documentation Improvement)** | Yes | Integrated with ambient workflow |
| **CDS (Clinical Decision Support)** | Yes | Point-of-care notifications, alerts |
| **Revenue Cycle Automation** | Yes | End-to-end RCM platform |
| **Prior Authorization** | Yes | Automated via AI agents |
| **Patient Engagement** | Yes | Via Memora Health integration |
| **Care Navigation** | Yes | Digital care pathways |

### Specialty Coverage
- **Ambulatory Care** - Full support
- **Emergency Department** - Specialized ED documentation (Augmedix Go)
- **Hospitalist Operations** - Full support
- **50+ Medical Specialties** - Via Augmedix platform
- **Orthopedics** - Hughston Clinic deployment
- **Pediatrics** - Bethany Children's deployment

---

## 8. 2025-2026 Roadmap & Strategic Direction

### Recent Product Launches (2025)

| Date | Launch | Description |
|------|--------|-------------|
| March 2025 | MEDITECH Alliance | Deep Expanse integration |
| June 2025 | Commure Agents | AI-powered workflow automation |
| September 2025 | MEDITECH Expanse Now | Mobile ambient AI embedding |

### Strategic Focus Areas

1. **Agentic AI Expansion**
   - Autonomous task completion across health systems
   - AI agents embedded in clinical and operational workflows
   - Post-appointment action automation

2. **Enterprise Scale**
   - Largest ambient AI rollouts (HCA, Tenet)
   - ARR doubled three years in a row
   - Expanding to 250K+ providers

3. **Full-Stack Platform**
   - Revenue cycle + Ambient AI + Practice Management
   - Single EHR-agnostic platform
   - Cross-workflow intelligence

4. **EHR Deeper Integration**
   - MEDITECH Expanse Now embedding
   - Epic Toolbox advancement
   - Oracle Health expansion

### Executive Vision (Tanay Tandon, CEO)
"We are building the future of healthcare AI. This platform goes beyond simple automation. It is designed to enhance clinical workflows in ways that allow healthcare providers to focus more on what matters most - caring for patients."

---

## 9. Competitive Positioning

### Key Differentiators

1. **Scale:** Largest ambient AI deployments in healthcare
2. **Full-Stack:** RCM + Ambient + Agents on single platform
3. **Hybrid Model:** Pure AI + Human-in-loop options (Augmedix)
4. **EHR Breadth:** 60+ integrations
5. **Enterprise Focus:** Co-development with HCA, Tenet
6. **Funding:** $6B valuation, $200M recent raise

### Market Position
- "One of the largest, most comprehensive, and fastest-growing artificial intelligence software suites in healthcare" (per CEO)
- Only 2 health tech companies on Fortune Future 50 (2025)
- TIME World's Top HealthTech Companies - Outstanding Performance
